ab.note: In 2329 επτα contains often a horizontal bar, which is missing on other numerals.
There is no accent mark on the word ιερεις. But see p 1r line 20, p 8r line 7 and p 31v line 9 where ιερεις contains an accent mark.
The visible accent marks indicate the word devision καὶ ἣν.
Based on VMR picture, it is hard to decide whether ακρατου is corrected or merely the parchment is rough at this place.
It is not possible to decide the accent mark.
